column1: '''''ñande''''' is a [[Quenya]] word meaning "a harp". A '''''ñandelle''''' is a "little harp".<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}
[[Helge Fauskanger]] has suggested that the forms ''nandë'' and ''nandellë'' (retaining the same meaning) could be valid [[Neo-Quenya]].<ref>[[Helge Fauskanger]]
column2: "[http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/eng-quen.rtf English-Quenya Wordlist (Quettaparma Quenyanna)]" at [http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/ Ardalambion] (accessed 25 June 2011)</ref>
